US strikes another Houthi anti-ship missileU.S. Central Command forces on Saturday struck a Houthi anti-ship missile that was aimed into the Gulf of Aden and prepared to launch, the U.S. military said, with the latest round of strikes coming hours after the United States struck three other Houthi anti-ship missiles. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 17:19:19 GMT VTTWGYGONBLNHGIRYNOPQBEMWI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-strikes-another-houthi-anti-ship-missile-2024-01-20/Kanishka Singh, Enas Alashray世界
US personnel suffer minor injuries in Iraq base attack: U.S. officialU.S. personnel suffered minor injuries and a member of Iraq's security forces was seriously wounded in an attack on Iraq's Ain al-Asad air base on Saturday, a U.S. official said. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 17:17:32 GMT 5AM24L4S2ZP33FPP5R5RLQ7QGE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-personnel-suffer-minor-injuries-iraq-base-attack-us-official-2024-01-20/Reuters世界
At Putin campaign HQ, soldier's wife says bring him homeThe wife of a Russian soldier delivered an emotional appeal for his return from Ukraine on Saturday at the election headquarters of President Vladimir Putin, a defiant gesture in a country where open criticism of the war is banned. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 13:43:10 GMT PGYKCJTSV5MILIUGKN3M7LGLSQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-campaign-hq-soldiers-wife-says-bring-him-home-2024-01-20/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel says its Gaza plans clash with 'Palestinian sovereignty'Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu appeared on Saturday to push back against U.S. President Joe Biden's remarks about Palestinian statehood after the war against Hamas in Gaza ends. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 13:07:05 GMT S25ZRJ6YOVKCVEXTVAEBCTCQVA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-told-biden-gaza-plans-clash-with-palestinian-sovereignty-statement-2024-01-20/Reuters世界中东
Seoul police chief indicted over Halloween crushSouth Korean prosecutors have indicted the head of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency​, charging him with contributing through negligence to the Halloween crowd crush in Seoul in 2022​ that killed nearly 160 people, according to the Seoul Western District Prosecutors Office. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 12:48:47 GMT GSLYWF7V25NZFLNO27AMXSN3JU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/seoul-police-chief-indicted-over-halloween-crush-2024-01-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
Four astronauts, including Turkey's first, arrive at space stationThe crew plans to study the effects of spaceflight on human health and disease. Iranian and Hezbollah commanders help direct Houthi attacks in YemenTehran has provided advanced drones, anti-ship cruise missiles, precision-strike ballistic missiles and medium-range missiles to the Houthis, who are targeting commercial vessels in solidarity with Palestinians in Gaza, the sources said. Indonesia's Prabowo strengthens lead in election pollsIndonesia's presidential candidate frontrunner Prabowo Subianto widened his lead over his opponents in the latest surveys as the world's third-largest democracy heads to an election on Feb. 14, two pollsters said on Saturday. Fighting across Gaza as Israel drops leaflets seeking its hostagesIsrael pounded targets across the Gaza Strip on Saturday while its planes dropped leaflets on the southern area of Rafah urging Palestinians seeking refuge there to help locate hostages held by Hamas, residents said. Iran vows revenge on Israel for strike that kills five guards in DamascusRescue operations for people stuck under the rubble continued. A crane was in place to hoist concrete slabs off the wreckage. New mosque construction in India's Ayodhya to begin in May, Muslim group saysAs Hindu devotees prepare to inaugurate a grand temple to one of their holiest deities, India's minority Muslims plan to begin building a new mosque in the same city later this year, hoping to make a fresh start after a bloody, decades-long dispute.
